pageContext.claim: “The UK and the U.S., as you probably have been seeing and hearing, we're agreeing to go forward and preserve our trade agreement.”
pageContext.analysis: The U.S. and the U.K. do not currently have a trade agreement. All trade with the U.K. is done via the European Union which the U.K. is exiting. They will have the opportunity to negotiate a trade agreement after Brexit is complete, but will also be hindered in important ways, according to Lawfare blog as they will have to follow certain portions of EU law.
